page.title: 05Matfield Village Green.
page.content: Located at the centre of Matfield, the village green is the setting for numerous events and activities.On the outskirts one can see the{cricket {pavillion}which is also used as the {Brownie}and{Guide hut.}The cricket club now has 5 residents on its team list.The{pond,}restocked with fish by the Parish Council after the hard winter,can only be fished by{licence {holders:-}parish residents under 16. In the summer the scene is set for the{Village Fete,}including an{"It's a {Knockout"}competition when teams compete in various fun and games.The money raised is going towards the rebuilding of the Village Hall.{Every {other year}it hosts the Brenchley and Matfield{Horticultural Society Show which has various exhibits of fruit, flowers,vegetables and crafts,with side shows,childrens races and teas.
